{{codepointer|Spawn}}'''A_DropWeaponPieces''' (string ''p1'' , string ''p2'' , string ''p3'')
Spawns all three items with a slight random outward momentum from the calling actor.
== Examples == When this imp is defeated, it drops a pool of blood, a {{class|BlueCard|blue key}} and a slowly moving fireball to potentially hurt the killer even after death.
Death: TROO I 8 TROO J 8 A_Scream TROO K 6 TNT1 A 0 A_DropWeaponPieces("{{class|SmallBloodPool}}","BlueCard","{{class|DoomImpBall}}") // to simulate {{property|DropItem}}, it has to be called together w/ [[A_Fall]] TROO L 6 [[A_Fall]] TROO M -1 stop
